metadata.name: Help Vladyslav
metadata.description:
Children for Children ❤️
This Collection is dedicated to drawings of children who want to help the little Vladislav, 1-year-old, sick from SMA, the first child of a Ukrainian family that has just found temporary refuge from the war in Poland.

Vladislav needs a miracle drug called “Zolgensma”, the only way for LIFE, at its current price of $2.3 Million.
They have collected around $160.000 but $2.3 Million is so far at the moment. 
This NFT auction is for Him.

Please be kind and make your bid! Once a bid is placed, a 24-hour auction will begin.

If you don’t want or you are not able to make a bid you can donate as here:
https://taplink.cc/help_vlad_sma

IG: https://www.instagram.com/help_vladyslav_sma/

FB: https://www.facebook.com/Help_Vladyslav_sma-105209252013530/
